sentences.en: Both Scotland and Northern Ireland had made last-minute substitutions.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队和北爱尔兰队都在最后时刻做了换人调整。

sentences.en: Britain does not agree and neither do Denmark, Portugal and Ireland.
sentences.cn: 英国不同意，丹麦、葡萄牙和爱尔兰也持反对意见。

sentences.en: By now you will have guessed that I'm back in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 你现在应该已经猜出我回到了爱尔兰了。

sentences.en: Etymology: over England; from one land to another; into Ireland.
sentences.cn: 词源学：越过英格兰，从一个陆地到另一个陆地，爱尔兰。

sentences.en: He suggested that the shapes represented a map of Britain and Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他暗示这些图形象征了英国和爱尔兰的地图。

sentences.en: His father took him on a sentimental pilgrimage to Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸带他踏上了去爱尔兰的情感之旅。

sentences.en: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

sentences.en: Others claim that Ireland's very essence is expressed through the language.
sentences.cn: 其他人声称爱尔兰最精髓的东西是通过语言表现出来的。

sentences.en: Rafferty was the sole survivor from the successful Ireland team of 1988.
sentences.cn: 拉弗蒂是1988年红极一时的爱尔兰队硕果仅存的球员。

sentences.en: She was privately educated at schools in Ireland and Paris.
sentences.cn: 她在爱尔兰和巴黎的学校接受过私立教育。

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The film takes no position on the politics of Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 这部电影未在北爱尔兰政治问题上选择站边。

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: The only thing that rankles me is what she says about Ireland.
sentences.cn: 唯一使我耿耿于怀的就是她那些关于爱尔兰的言论。

sentences.en: The Republic of Ireland is expected to raise interest rates.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰共和国预计会提高利率。

sentences.en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentences.cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

sentences.en: We are not yet fully resourced in Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 我们在北爱尔兰目前资源不足。

sentences.en: We surmised you had gone to Ireland.
sentences.cn: 我们还以为你去爱尔兰了呢，原来你并没去呀。

phrases.tran_cn: 北爱尔兰自治区（在爱尔兰东北部）
